settings.infos: Customization is only limited to premium styles.

settings.title: Why Do Price Changes For Bigger Sizes?
settings.infos: Additional charges are applicable if you are opting for plus sizes. These additional charges include charges for our workmanship.

settings.title: Do You Offer A Trial Before Buying?
settings.infos: Yes, we offer a trial at our Mumbai & Delhi flagship stores only.
